# SPT Local DB Website

[![spt ak](https://img.shields.io/badge/SPT_AKI-3.2.4-success.svg?logo=data:image/png;base64,)](https://hub.sp-tarkov.com/files/license/16-spt-aki/?versionID=3971)

![screenshot](./docs/screenshot.png)

## Usage

1. Take a release from the release tab here in Gitea
2. Place it the same you would with any other mod.
3. Start your SPT server
4. go to `localhost:6969/db-website` in your favorite browser

## Build yourself

If you want to build it yourself, you need to
1. run `npm i` in the root directory
2. make sure the submodule `frontend` pointing to `https://dev.sp-tarkov.com/WillDaPope/DB-Website` is up to date ([some documentation](https://devconnected.com/how-to-add-and-update-git-submodules/))
3. make sure the submodule `types` pointing to `https://dev.sp-tarkov.com/shirito/spt-types.git` is up to date ([some documentation](https://devconnected.com/how-to-add-and-update-git-submodules/))
4. run `npm build-n-zip`
